layout.description: Hire me to create your web application. Web Developer and Systems Engineer. Specialized in creating unique applications.
layout.title: Fidel García's Portfolio - Web Developer and Programmer

about.title: About me
about.description:
My name is Edwin Fidel García Távara. I started programming in my career, with an inventory project. I currently work focused on the backend.
Some of my achievements include collaborating on a project for a company in Spain, and creating a crop management system for a company in my country.
My goal is to improve as a developer to become a Software Architect.

banner.title: Edwin Fidel García Távara
banner.subtitle: {{years}} years of experience. Backend focused Web Developer from Piura, Peru

first.title: Administrative Assistant
first.descriptionOne: Created an IT inventory system, reducing management time by 30%.
first.descriptionTwo: Optimized the institution's website for better accessibility.
first.descriptionThree: Provided technical support, ensuring continuity of IT systems.

second.title: Office Support- Developer FullStack
second.descriptionOne: Designed web systems for company areas using Laravel and Vue.js.
second.descriptionTwo: Developed a system to manage agricultural production and harvests.
second.descriptionThree: Improved maintenance and logistics for agricultural machinery.

third.title: July 2024 - November 2024
third.descriptionOne: Developed interfaces based on Figma designs using Laravel, Inertia.js, and Vue.js.
third.descriptionTwo: Implemented backend logic and connected to MySQL databases.
third.descriptionThree: Presented progress to clients and adjusted solutions based on feedback.
